medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient seeks advice on preventing a heart attack or stroke.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms are prompted by his best friend's heart attack and his father's history of a massive heart attack at age 59. He has no awareness of any medical problems or symptoms prior to this visit.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's father suffered a massive heart attack at age 59.
medical_history.social_history: The patient continues to smoke approximately 10 cigarettes a day, has a sedentary job, and acknowledges accumulating approximately 25 pounds of excess weight over the past 20 years.
